subject: Dear Sir,
body:
Dear Sir,
This is to inform you that we have received an "Irrevocable Approval" from the authorities to release your unpaid/inherited funds, Which have been recovered by the Financial Service Authority (FSA),. This time your funds have been scheduled to be released directly to you, following investigations carried out by this office.
By your response and confirmation of your current contact details  Your Contact telephone/mobile numbers,  via return email, I will give you detailed information on how to release the funds
Thanks and waiting for your response.
Yours sincerely,

subject: Re: Dear Sir,
body:
Dear Sir,

Thank you for your email. I am glad to hear that the Financial Service Authority has approved the release of my unpaid inherited funds. 

Here are my contact details:

Mobile Number: 

I look forward to receiving detailed instructions on how to access these funds.

Best wishes,
Virginia
